channel.title: Help pleaseeeeeee
channel.description: Ok, i need help; say i do ::jail Example, how do i make it, so when you jail/ban/mute it will be shouted out, Like everyone can see it Eg: " Pot up pls, has just Muted Example" If any-one could help me, i'd apriciate it.

item.title: Help pleaseeeeeee
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

[quote=“pot up pls, post:9, topic:402155”][quote author=ArmaScape link=topic=499207.msg3650616#msg3650616 date=1309711719]

:EDIT Thanks man, Repped it worked.
[/quote]Glad to help buddy.

Would it be the same with ::mute ect?[/quote]Yeah just add the c.yell again, it will work.

Read full topic

item.title: Help pleaseeeeeee
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

[quote=“pot up pls, post:5, topic:402155”]Yeah.[/quote]Okay go to client.java server sided.
Then add this in there somewhere:

public void yell(String message) {
		for (Player p : Server.playerHandler.players) {
			if ((p == null) || !p.isActive)
				continue;
			Client temp = (Client) p;
			if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0))
				if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive)
					temp.sendMessage(message);
		}
	}

After you’ve done that. Your going to want to send the message to all the players.
So go to commands.java and find your jail command.
Then somewhere on that command your going to want to add something like this:

c.yell("[@blu@Punishment@bla@]@dre@"+c.playerName+" has jailed "+c2.playerName+".");

Hope I helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Help pleaseeeeeee
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

[quote=“pot up pls, post:3, topic:402155”][quote author=baddy351 link=topic=499207.msg3650572#msg3650572 date=1309709957]
What type of server?
[/quote]
PI.[/quote]Why don’t you just have the message sent to everyone online at the time, what I did was is make it say something like:

[Punishment]"+c.playerName+" has jailed "+c2.playername+"

Do you want something like that?

Read full topic
